name: render
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Render resources.

clearCacheOnServiceUpdateDeployments.description: When a service is updated, a deployment is automatically triggered. This variable controls whether or not the service cache should be cleared upon deployment.

registry.description: The registry to use this credential with

username.description: The username associated with the credential

render:registrycredentials:RegistryCrede.description: The registry to use this credential with

max.description: The maximum number of instances for the service

min.description: The minimum number of instances for the service

percentage.description: Determines when your service will be scaled. If the average resource utilization is significantly above/below the target, we will increase/decrease the number of instances.

numInstances.description: For a *manually* scaled service, this is the number of instances the service is scaled to. DOES NOT indicate the number of running instances for an *autoscaled* service.

plan.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

render:services:BackgroundWorkerDetailsP.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

plan.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

render:services:CronJobDetailsPlan.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

image.description: Image information used when creating the deploy. Not present for Git-backed deploys

render:services:DeployImageProperties.description: Image information used when creating the deploy. Not present for Git-backed deploys

ref.description: Image reference used when creating the deploy

registryCredential.description: Name of credential used to pull the image, if provided

sha.description: SHA that the image reference was resolved to when creating the deploy

path.description: The request path to add the header to. Wildcards will cause headers to be applied to all matching paths.

imagePath.description: Path to the image used for this server (e.g docker.io/library/nginx:latest).

ownerId.description: The ID of the owner for this image. This should match the owner of the service as well as the owner of any specified registry credential.

registryCredentialId.description: Optional reference to the registry credential passed to the image repository to retrieve this image.

render:services:ImageProperties.description: Image information used when creating the deploy. Not present for Git-backed deploys

ref.description: Image reference used when creating the deploy

registryCredential.description: Name of credential used to pull the image, if provided

sha.description: SHA that the image reference was resolved to when creating the deploy

numInstances.description: For a *manually* scaled service, this is the number of instances the service is scaled to. DOES NOT indicate the number of running instances for an *autoscaled* service.

plan.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

render:services:PrivateServiceDetailsPla.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

priority.description: Redirect and Rewrite Rules are applied in priority order starting at 0

provider.description: The provider type for the render package.

username.description: The username associated with the credential

max.description: The maximum number of instances for the service

min.description: The minimum number of instances for the service

image.description: Image information used when creating the deploy. Not present for Git-backed deploys

commitId.description: Specific ID of commit to deploy for a web service, defaults to latest commit. Not supported for Cron Job deploys.

image.description: Image information used when creating the deploy. Not present for Git-backed deploys

imageUrl.description: URL of the image to deploy for an image-backed service. The host, repository, and image name must match the currently configured image for the service.

commitId.description: Specific ID of commit to deploy for a web service, defaults to latest commit. Not supported for Cron Job deploys.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image to deploy for an image-backed service. The host, repository, and image name must match the currently configured image for the service.

imagePath.description: Must be either a full URL or the relative path to an image. If a relative path, Render uses the base service's image URL as its root. For example, if the base service's image URL is `docker.io/library/nginx:latest`, then valid values are: `docker.io/library/nginx:<any tag or SHA>`, `library/nginx:<any tag or SHA>`, or `nginx:<any tag or SHA>`. Note that the path must match (only the tag or SHA can vary).

name.description: A name for the service preview instance. If not specified, Render generates the name using the base service's name and the specified tag or SHA.

plan.description: The instance type to use for the preview instance. Note that base services with any paid instance type can't create preview instances with the `free` instance type.

imagePath.description: Must be either a full URL or the relative path to an image. If a relative path, Render uses the base service's image URL as its root. For example, if the base service's image URL is `docker.io/library/nginx:latest`, then valid values are: `docker.io/library/nginx:<any tag or SHA>`, `library/nginx:<any tag or SHA>`, or `nginx:<any tag or SHA>`. Note that the path must match (only the tag or SHA can vary).

customDomainIdOrName.description: The ID or name of the custom domain

deployId.description: The ID of the deploy to rollback to
